item.title: 市场权衡美国库存增加和欧佩克+供应计划，石油价格持稳
item.description: 周三亚洲早盘，油价变化不大，因为市场参与者权衡了美国原油和燃料库存增加以及欧佩克+延长减产的可能性。【原文：Oil prices were little changed in early Asia trade on Wednesday as market participants weighed higher U.S. crude oil and fuel inventories as well as the likelihood of OPEC+ extending supply cuts.】

item.title: 财新PMI显示11月中国服务业活动扩张放缓
item.description: 一项私营部门调查显示，11月份中国服务业活动增速放缓，受新业务增长（包括出口）放缓的压力，中国经济正准备迎接特朗普第二任政府征收更多美国关税的艰难局面。【原文：China's services activity expanded at a slower pace in November, pressured by easing new business growth, including in exports, a private sector survey showed, as the economy braces for a rocky ride of more U.S. tariffs under a second Trump administration.】

item.title: 韩国政局动荡，亚洲股市下滑
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市跌宕起伏，货币大幅波动，交易商们争相应对韩国的政治风暴，韩国实施了戒严令，数小时后又解除了戒严。【原文：Asian equities stumbled on Wednesday while currencies were volatile as traders scrambled to contend with the political storm in South Korea, where martial law was imposed and subsequently lifted hours later.】

item.title: 美联储路在何方，美元保持坚挺；戒严令解除后，韩元保持稳定
item.description: 周三，美元对日元汇率从三周低点回升，对其他主要对手汇率保持稳定，因为交易商在思考美联储本月降息的可能性。【原文：The U.S. dollar recovered from a three-week low versus the yen on Wednesday and held its ground against other major rivals as traders pondered the chances of a Federal Reserve interest-rate cut this month.】

item.title: 日本服务业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，日本服务业活动因需求改善而回暖
item.description: 周三的一项私营部门调查显示，由于需求改善支撑了新业务，日本 11 月份的服务业活动转而恢复增长。【原文：Japan's service activity swung back to growth in November as improving demand supported new business, a private sector survey showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 韩国监管机构准备随时部署 10 万亿韩元的股市稳定基金 -Yonhap
item.description: 韩联社称，韩国金融监管机构周三表示，已准备好随时向股市稳定基金投入 10 万亿韩元（约合 70.7 亿美元）。【原文：South Korea's financial regulator said on Wednesday that it was ready to deploy 10 trillion won ($7.07 billion) in a stock market stabilization fund any time, the Yonhap news agency said.】

item.title: 欧元将继续疲软，但暂时不会与美元平价
item.description: 路透社（Reuters）对市场策略师进行的民意调查显示，受困于法国政局动荡和美国明年初将加征新关税的预期，欧元近期将继续疲软。【原文：A retreating euro will remain weak in the near term, trapped between political ructions building in France and expected new U.S. tariffs early next year that are boosting the dollar's allure, a Reuters poll of market strategists found.】

item.title: 追踪证券化债务、人工智能和诺和诺德的 ETF 为 2024 年行业发展锦上添花
item.description: 本周二，三家不同的资产管理公司分别推出了交易所交易基金，在今年新基金大量涌现的最后几周，它们分别推出了专注于证券化债务、人工智能产业和 Ozempic 制造商诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）的产品。【原文：Three separate asset management firms launched exchange-traded funds on Tuesday, unveiling products focused on securitized debt, the artificial intelligence industry and Ozempic-maker Novo Nordisk in the closing weeks of a year that has seen a deluge of new funds.】

item.title: 韩国央行将于韩国时间上午 9 时左右召开特别会议--韩国央行官员
item.description: 在韩国总统尹锡烈（Yoon Suk Yeol）一夜之间突然解除戒严令后，韩国央行的一位官员周三表示，该行的货币政策委员会将于韩国时间上午 9 点左右召开一次特别委员会会议。【原文：A Bank of Korea official on Wednesday said the bank's monetary policy board will convene an extraordinary board meeting at around 9 a.m. KST after President Yoon Suk Yeol lifted a surprise martial law declaration overnight.】

item.title: Netflix 日本用户突破 1,000 万，节目备受关注
item.description: 今年上半年，Netflix 在日本的用户数量突破了 1,000 万，该流媒体公司的日语节目在这个日益增长的市场上备受关注。【原文：Netflix's subscribers passed 10 million in Japan in the first half of this year with the streaming firm's Japanese-language programming grabbing attention in the growing market.】

item.title: 奥克兰机场股票交易因奥克兰议会出售剩余股份而停止
item.description: 奥克兰国际机场周三停止股票交易，因为该机场运营商称，已接到通知，奥克兰委员会已开始出售其持有的该公司剩余的 9.71% 股份。【原文：Trading in the shares of Auckland International Airport was halted on Wednesday after the airport operator said it was notified that Auckland Council had started a process to sell its remaining 9.71% stake in the company.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，富国银行将出售旧金山总部
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二报道，富国银行将出售其旧金山总部，因为这家美国银行业巨头正将重心转向美国东海岸。【原文：Wells Fargo is set to sell its San Francisco headquarters, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, as the U.S. banking giant shifts its focus to the country's East Coast.】

item.title: 金宝莱销售额低于预期，任命内部人士 Beekhuizen 为首席执行官
item.description: 金宝汤公司周二公布的季度净销售额低于市场预期，公司任命内部人士 Mick Beekhuizen 为新任首席执行官，在消费者需求不稳定的情况下，公司将重点放在更多样化的包装食品上。【原文：Campbell's Co fell short of market expectations for quarterly net sales on Tuesday and named insider Mick Beekhuizen as its new chief executive officer, as the company sharpens focus on a more diverse range of packaged food products amid choppy consumer demand.】

item.title: 早间新闻韩国戒严混乱加深警惕
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 保德信金融任命内部人士安德鲁-沙利文为首席执行官
item.description: 保德信金融公司周二任命内部人士安德鲁-沙利文（Andrew Sullivan）接替查尔斯-洛瑞（Charles Lowrey）担任首席执行官。【原文：Prudential Financial on Tuesday named insider Andrew Sullivan as its CEO, succeeding Charles Lowrey.】

item.title: 联合健康预测 2025 年利润低于预期
item.description: 联合健康（UnitedHealth）周二预计，2025 年调整后利润低于华尔街预期。【原文：UnitedHealth on Tuesday forecast adjusted profit for 2025 below Wall Street estimates.】

item.title: 云计算需求强劲，Salesforce 第三季度营收超出预期
item.description: 本周二，Salesforce 第三季度营收超出华尔街预期，并上调了全年营收预期的下限。【原文：Salesforce beat Wall Street expectations for third-quarter revenue on Tuesday and raised the lower end of its annual revenue forecast, helped by robust spending on its enterprise cloud portfolio.】

item.title: Meta 为 2030 年代初启动的反应堆寻找核电开发商
item.description: Meta 公司周二表示，它正在寻求核电开发商的建议，以帮助实现其人工智能和环保目标，成为在电力需求预期激增的背景下对原子能感兴趣的最新一家大型科技公司。【原文：Meta said on Tuesday it is seeking proposals from nuclear power developers to help meet its artificial intelligence and environment goals, becoming the latest big tech company to take interest in atomic power amid an expected boom in power demand.】

item.title: Celsius 创始人亚历克斯-马辛斯基（Alex Mashinsky）表示同意承认两项欺诈指控
item.description: 加密货币贷款公司 Celsius Network 的创始人兼前首席执行官亚历克斯-马辛斯基（Alex Mashinsky）周二表示，他打算承认两项欺诈罪。【原文：Alex Mashinsky, the founder and former CEO of cryptocurrency lender Celsius Network, said on Tuesday he intends to plead guilty to two counts of fraud.】

item.title: 打击中国电信入侵的美国官员敦促加强加密
item.description: 一位美国高级官员是努力将所谓的中国黑客驱逐出美国电信公司的人员之一，他对美国同胞提出了一个忠告：【原文：A senior U.S. official who is among those working to evict alleged Chinese hackers from American telecom companies has a word of advice for his fellow Americans:】

item.title: 美泰公司因 "邪恶 "玩偶与色情网站链接而被起诉
item.description: 周二，美泰公司被南卡罗来纳州的一位母亲告上法庭，原因是该公司错误地在与大片《邪恶》（Wicked）相关的玩偶包装上放上了色情网站的链接。【原文：Mattel was sued on Tuesday by a South Carolina mother for mistakenly putting a link to a pornographic website on packaging for dolls tied to the blockbuster movie "Wicked."】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会与出售政治和怀孕信息的数据经纪商达成和解
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周二表示，两家出售用于追踪个人宗教和政治信仰、怀孕状况等信息的消费者数据经纪商同意停止使用敏感地点访问数据。【原文：Two consumer data brokers that sold information used to track individuals' religious and political beliefs, pregnancy status and more agreed to stop using data on visits to sensitive locations, the U.S. Federal Trade Commission said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，TPG 正探讨以 15 亿多美元的价格出售连锁健身房 Crunch Fitness
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周二告诉路透社，收购公司 TPG 正在权衡出售 Crunch Fitness 的可能性，包括债务在内，该连锁健身房的估值可能超过 15 亿美元。【原文：Buyout firm TPG is weighing a potential sale of Crunch Fitness that could value the gym chain at more than $1.5 billion, including debt, people familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: ADM 认为 2025 年仍将面临挑战，重点是成本控制
item.description: 全球谷物贸易商阿彻-丹尼尔斯-米德兰公司（Archer-Daniels-Midland）周二表示，该公司正在集中精力控制成本，因为 "充满挑战 "的大宗商品周期侵蚀了利润，并有可能持续到2025年。【原文：Global grains trader Archer-Daniels-Midland said on Tuesday the company is focusing on controlling costs as a "challenging" commodities cycle that has eroded profits is likely to continue into 2025.】

item.title: 议会投票解除戒严令，韩国当局誓言稳定市场
item.description: 韩国财政部长周三表示，韩国总统尹锡烈在紧急全国讲话中宣布戒严后，政府将在必要时采取一切可能的措施稳定金融市场。【原文：South Korea's finance minister said on Wednesday the government would deploy all possible measures to stabilize financial markets if needed after President Yoon Suk Yeol declared martial law in an emergency national address.】

item.title: 消息人士称，拉扎德聘用花旗集团的米勒推进能源投资银行业务
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周二告诉路透社，拉扎德聘请了花旗集团资深投资银行家克里斯-米勒（Chris Miller）担任董事总经理，帮助推动其在能源行业的交易工作。【原文：Lazard has hired veteran Citigroup investment banker Chris Miller as a managing director to help drive its dealmaking efforts in the energy industry, people familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 亚马逊宣布新一批人工智能模型
item.description: 亚马逊在 AWS 年度会议上宣布了一系列新的人工智能平台（称为基础模型），可生成文本、图像和视频等。【原文：Amazon announced a new slate of artificial intelligence platforms, known as foundation models, at its annual AWS conference, allowing for text, image and video generation among other things.】

item.title: 埃克森任命通用汽车前总裁管理油气业务
item.description: 埃克森美孚周二表示，通用汽车公司前总裁丹-阿曼（Dan Ammann）将于明年初接管该公司规模最大、盈利能力最强的业务。【原文：Exxon Mobil said on Tuesday that Dan Ammann, former president of General Motors , will take over its largest and most profitable business early next year.】

item.title: 万事达卡就解决英国大规模收费案达成 "原则性协议
item.description: 万事达卡（Mastercard）周二表示，该公司已原则上达成协议，解决代表英国消费者提起的关于银行卡费用的伦敦集体诉讼。【原文：Mastercard has reached an agreement in principle to settle a collective London lawsuit brought on behalf of British consumers over card fees, it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储主席库格勒称通胀有望达到 2% 的目标，就业市场稳固
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里安娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）周二表示，美国通胀率很可能会稳步回归美国央行设定的2%的目标，就业市场即使在 "适度降温 "的情况下依然 "稳健"。【原文：U.S. inflation is likely on a steady path back to the U.S. central bank's 2% target, Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler said on Tuesday, with the job market still "solid" even as it undergoes a "modest cooling."】
